quote: I promise I'll come back. No matter what happens."" Though his voice was only a whisper, there was a fierceness behind it. I believed him completely. ""I'll wait for you,"" I told him.
quote_letters: I PROMISE ILL COME BACK NO MATTER WHAT HAPPENS THOUGH HIS VOICE WAS ONLY A WHISPER THERE WAS A FIERCENESS BEHIND IT I BELIEVED HIM COMPLETELY ILL WAIT FOR YOU I TOLD HIM
